category: Referee Committee Regulations/Article 25 (Rewards and Punishments of Referees)
contents: Article 25 (Rewards and Punishments of Referees) ① If a referee makes a clear mistake or uses words or actions that are grounds for disciplinary action, such as causing social controversy or damaging the dignity of the referee, the referee will be dealt with in accordance with the ‘Sports Fairness Committee Regulations’ of the relevant organization. ② Referee qualifications may be demoted if misjudgments accumulate, and referee qualifications may also be revoked depending on the number of misjudgments.
